name: Flappy Bird Clone (Migs Pang)
description:
A simple flappy bird game using pygame.

R.I.P. Flappy Bird

How to play:

Press SPACE to make the bird fly

How to run:

1. Open IDLE by searching for IDLE then clicking on it

2. Hover mouse over File then press Open

3. On the folder, click "Pygame flappy bird"

example of #3:

4. Press F5 or Run

5. If project isn't saved, then press OK

You're done!
